body.name: BUZIO Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle 64oz (Cold for 48 Hrs/Hot for 24 Hrs) BPA Free Double Wall Travel Mug/Flask for Outdoor Sports Hiking, Cycling, Camping, Running

features: Vacuum Insulated: The unique ThermoArmour technology inside this insulated water bottle keeps beverage cold up to 48 hours and hot up to 24 hours

2 Caps Pack: This 64 oz stainless steel water bottle comes with straw lid and flex cap, the flex cap is perfect for the beach, camping and hiking, while the straw lid is suitable for cycling and road trip
Superior Material: Made of 100% non-toxic BPA-free plastics & durable food-grade 18/8 stainless steel, protecting the water flask from oxidation and flavor transfer
User-friendly Design: With the Buzio powder-coat technology & Wide mouth (2.2 inches), your Buzio bottle is easy for gripping, cleaning and ice-filling
What You Get: Buzio 64oz Water Bottle with carrying pouch, Straw Lid, Flex Lid, 2 x Straws, Bottle Brush, our worry-free lifetime warranty and friendly customer service

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BUZIO patent ThermoArmour technology is known to use only the most rigorously selected material and state-of-the-art workmanship. Featuring 100% 18/8 food-grade stainless steel, BUZIO water bottles keep your beverages fresh and authentic with zero oxidation and decomposition hazard.
The Merge of Modern and Classic

BUZIO is a forever evolving brand and its powder-coat technology is one of its most classic pinnacles. Non-slip sweat-free finish allows steady grip in any condition. The coat lasts through daily wear and tear and won't fade or crack, so that each bottle is housed in the freshest hue.

Waste Reduction & Sustainability BUZIO is dedicated to building a sustainable eco-system by cutting back on the use of single-use plastics. Promise of Lifetime Quality Service BUZIO believes a good bottle should last a lifetime, and we want to make sure yours does too! That’s why we offer BUZIO Lifetime Lifetime Quality Service. BUZIO 30oz Insulated Tumbler with Handle BUZIO tumbler with 2 in1 lid and straw allows you to suck or sip as you wish. SHOP

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The BUZIO 64 oz Insulated Water Bottle is a hydration powerhouse, combining an impressive capacity with thoughtful design features. The inclusion of both a straw lid and flex lid adds versatility, and the stainless steel construction ensures your beverages stay refreshingly cold or piping hot for extended periods, making it an excellent choice for those who prioritize both functionality and durability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This water bottle is beyond amazing!!! It keeps the ice water cold forever!!! Let me tell you, I live in south Florida where it’s very hot 24/7 and I took this water bottle to work at 6am and by the time it was night around 11pm there was still ice inside and it was very cold!!! This is amazing. I have not used something hot inside yet but I’m sure it’ll keep things very hot. And I LOVE the way it can be held on your shoulder like a purse! Makes it very comfortable and convenient to carry all day. It comes with straw cleaners and you can switch between multiple different caps, whether you want a regular top or straw. It also DOES NOT LEAK. Also a big plus. I definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am somewhat of a child, in the sense that I drop things and swing things around. I have had those water bottle for over a year and it is durable.It’s not invincible but even with dings and chips it is still perfectly functional.The outside is a textured material that enhances grip, the inner walls are stainless steel. In the time I’ve owned it, the only damage or signs of aging have been from my neglect.The coating completely encases the bottle and adds a bit of insulating properties to the bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps content cold or hot
reviews.reviewText: Nice product, but the cover is hard to remove.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the money..but..
reviews.reviewText: I work in the construction field in Texas and it gets HOT most of the year, so having cold water (and keeping it cold) is paramount. Since the advent of the double steel walled insulated "drinking tech" of the last few years, this problem has been solved. Unfortunately, your main name brands like to charge an exorbitant amount of money for basically the same thing other companies offer, such as this. This product works the same as the other high priced name brands, but for a fraction of the cost. Plus you get a few extras, noticeably the insulating neoprene cover/carrying case, straws and brush for the handled "straw lid".Couple cons though: Due to the straw lid, pouring water out of the spout is slow. You can't pour water out if the inner straw is attached and if the straw is removed, it's a dribble. Don't lose the lids inner o-ring or it will leak everywhere. I noticed a heavy chemical smell from the bottle halfway through the day of the bottle sitting in my truck. Seems heat and sun exposure to the LID creates this smell. I've washed it and kept it out of the sun and haven't noticed the smell coming back. Weird.Finally, while the cover works and is very cool, I don't think it'll last long term. While I do use it in a harsher work environment, I dont think the material is tough enough: The silver metal strap clasps, as well as the D rings they attach to are thin and flimsy. They have become unhooked on several occasions of normal walking with the strap over my shoulder and I would have dropped (and dented) the bottle if I didn't have a firm grip on the strap already. The pull tab on the zipper that's on the bottom of the cover is already missing after 2 weeks. There's also a secondary "hand strap" that is sewn to the outside of the cover, for what I'm assuming is to help with drinking but I don't trust the stitching...at all...not for neoprene anyways. I opted to buy a third party gallon carrying bag for my 87oz container and solved my problems. Just keep the old cover on the bottle, and it'll fit fine in the gallon bag.TL;DR: It's a good product for the price, but definitely could use some improvements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best water bottle
reviews.reviewText: This is the best water bottle for the price. I have the 40oz and drink about 100 oz of water a day. This water bottle holds ice for 2-3 days. Who needs a Stanley or Yeti when you can have this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits perfectly in my Escape cup holder.
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfectly in my Ford Escape cup holder. Easy to fill from my refrigerator ice and water door. Keeps my water nice and cold throughout the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUZIO Insulated Water Bottle: The Ultimate Hydration Companion
reviews.reviewText: The first thing that strikes you about the BUZIO Insulated Water Bottle is its incredible 64 oz capacity. Yes, you heard that right! This is not your everyday water bottle; it's a hydration powerhouse designed to ensure you never run out of your favorite drink, be it a refreshing cold brew or a soothing hot tea.The double-wall vacuum insulation is the star of the show. It works like a charm to keep your drinks at the right temperature for extended periods, cold for 48 hours and hot for 24 hours. Whether you're going hiking on a sunny day or planning a winter camping trip, the BUZIO water bottle ensures that you always have a refreshing sip or a warm drink handy.Constructed from food-grade 18/8 stainless steel, this water bottle offers unmatched durability. It's built to withstand the rigors of outdoor adventures and daily use while maintaining its shine and appearance. Plus, the BPA-free material ensures that your drinks remain free from any harmful chemicals.The package comes with two types of lids - a Straw Lid and a Flex Lid, offering you the flexibility to switch according to your convenience and the nature of the drink. The straw lid is perfect for sipping on the go, while the flex lid is ideal for hot beverages or using the bottle as a flask.But what sets the BUZIO water bottle apart from the rest is its commitment to your comfort. The wide mouth design for easy cleaning, the carry handle for comfortable transport, and the silicone pad for extra grip, every feature is thoughtfully designed with your comfort in mind.In summary, the BUZIO Insulated Water Bottle is not just an accessory; it's your hydration partner that combines functionality, durability, and style in a unique way.

reviews.reviewTitle: Mantiene mi agua fria por horas y horas, aveces días
reviews.reviewText: Excelente producto, no sé como le hacen pero funciona
Mantiene la bebida con hielos hasta ahorita por 48 horas, está padrísimo el diseño y viene con tapa extra

Muy buen producto. no tiene fugas a pesar de lo rudo de su movimiento. Los acabados son muy buenos así como la textura en la pintura. Obviamente requiere ser cuidadoso en su manejo para que no se raye o maltrate la pintura. Conserva los líquidos fríos por toda una jornada laboral o mas
Entrega en su empaque original y es el segundo que compro. Buena calidad y contiene los accesorios que indica según el modelo.
I love this water bottle. It’s larger than most I’ve come across, is excellent quality and heavy duty construction. It also keeps drinks cold for a very long time. Next best thing to my yetis.
